textBox.richText: SmartCodes QR Codes Launched a few weeks ago and I hope you all enjoy it. For all of you non-techie people I suggest you close this post now. The QR Code generator runs on the open-source Google Chart API, and so far can only run online. We are working on an offline version, but we might have to move away from the Google API and start using another QR code API known as QR Server, which can run offline with some help from C++ and PHP.
